title: Passwords without Managers
summary:
Navigating the labyrinth of password creation can seem daunting. This guide provides a balanced
                    approach, advocating the use of password formulas to generate unique, memorable, and secure
                    passwords for every site you use. By concocting your own recipe, you can create a strong password
                    that meets each site's requirements and keep it fresh with simple annual updates. It's a 'set and
                    forget' method that replaces the need for sticky notes or repetitive passwords and offers a smart
                    solution to modern password dilemmas.

title: My First Crypto Arbitrage Bot
summary: Documentation of my first attempt at a crypto arbitrage bot.

title: Building the SolidVote Decentralized Voting Application
summary:
I discuss creating SolidVote, a decentralized voting app on Ethereum. The journey involved smart
                    contracts, Truffle, Ganache, web3.js, Node.js, and Metamask integration, leading to a functional and
                    secure voting application.

title: Welcome to the Pantech Phone Server
summary:
My experience setting up my first local server using Tiny Server. Outlines roadmap for learning web servers
			and programming, including my goal of pursuing Ethereum-based smart contract programming. The post also
			provides instructions for setting up SSH access and authorized keys for passwordless login.

title: My Journey Setting Up a LAMP Server on an HP Mini
summary:
Reviving my HP Mini with Lubuntu, I share my journey of setting up a LAMP server. Despite hardware
			limitations and resolution challenges, I find solutions to wifi and video issues. Join me as I breathe new
			life into this old machine for web server experimentation.
